title: The Qualys Podcast - Peter Attia

h2: My thoughts on alcohol consumption and health
The 5 habits Tim Ferriss returns to most reliably
The difference between glucose and fructose
h3: In addition to The Qualys, subscribers also receive additional benefits:

paragraphs: The Qualysis a subscriber-exclusive podcast, released Tuesday through Friday, and published exclusively on our private, subscriber-only podcast feed.Qualysis short-hand for “qualifying round,” which  are typically the fastest laps driven in a race car—done  before the race to determine starting position on the grid for race day.The Qualysare short (i.e., “fast”), typically less than ten minutes, and highlight the best questions, topics, and tactics discussed onThe Drive.
Subscribe tothe Qualys
A short intro from Peter about The Qualys
#18 – Richard Isaacson, M.D.: Alzheimer’s prevention
#04 – AMA #1: alcohol, best lab tests, wearables, finding the right doc, racing, and more
#01 – Tim Ferriss: depression, psychedelics, and emotional resilience
#14 – Robert Lustig, M.D., M.S.L.: fructose, processed food, NAFLD, and changing the food system
Listen to more Qualys

Access to members-only Ask Me Anything (AMA) podcasts and AMA forumYou get access to the back catalogue of AMA podcasts, and all future AMA episodes. You’ll also get the ability to participate by submitting your questions via the AMA page for possible future episodes. Full AMA episodes will be released through the members-only podcast feed.

Comprehensive podcast show notesWe take extreme pride in detailing every topic, paper, person, and thing discussed in every episode of The Drive. This takes us a lot of time to produce, but there truly is no better way to take a deep dive into any of the topics we explore on the show.

Exclusive discount codes for products we believe inI want my supporters to get the best deals out there on products I love. Although we do not take sponsorship money from anyone, we’re working closely with some products I love and buy myself to get exclusive members-only discounts. This allows us to take the money sponsors would have paid me, and pass that on as savings to you instead.

Exclusive private podcast feedSubscribe to our members-only podcast feed in your favorite podcast player to get every episode of The Drive without the subscriber callout, plus full episodes of our monthly, members-only AMA podcasts, and other exclusive content.
Subscribe Now
Peter Attia is a physician focusing on the applied science of longevity.
